Wardrobe, Telephone, Internet, Window guards, corner, pass-through, Heating system: central, gas, Hot water: gas 
 Urgent!!! 140 sq.m. 4 rooms (changed to 3 rooms) Apartment is selling in the best place of Vake distinct- corner of Abashidze & Kavsadze streets - for a very low price! The building is built in the end of 1980-s. The Building has entrance as from Abashidze, as well from Kavsadze streets, is The Apartment has 2 entrances: 1 - from the Garden, and has a parking place. The apartment is renovated with central heating system, conditioner, big balcony and beautiful garden; 2 bathrooms, 2 big bedrooms (20-22 sq.m,), Hall, corridor, large living room with a fireplace, separated dining room, isolated goodsize kitchen. Selling price 155.000 $, or the Apartment can be rented also, contact tel. 591918115, 555025151

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake,  Vake, Ir. Abashidze st.
